credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: White Mountain Wagon
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
medium: Brush and oil paint on mahogany panel
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of a three-bench wagon carrying seven passengers along a ridge in foreground, overlooking distant mountains and sky with clouds in the background.
Verso:  Mountain landscape with house in middle distance.
name: Painting
